stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes a likely unintended consequence of the restoration plan based on the data in the map?

features.html: American crocodiles thrive in healthy estuaries and are found distributed across southern Florida, the Caribbean islands, and in parts of northern South America. The American crocodile has always been considered rare in the state of Florida, and restoration efforts have been in effect for decades to aid the crocodile in heavily populated coastal areas.

choicesHtml: Periodic surveys will determine the distribution, relative abundance, growth, and survival of the crocodiles.
There will be an increase in the number of human and crocodile interactions in coastal areas.
The American crocodile will make a comeback in many areas of South Florida.
Female crocodiles will lay eggs in nests along the waterâ€™s edge.
